CardItems.Title: Premier Credit Card
CardItems.Summary: Whether you're at home or travelling, your HSBC Premier Credit Card is part of your seamless banking experience, providing you with a complete range of exclusive benefits covering dining, shopping, travel and entertainment.
CardItems.CircleTitleOneDescription: Enjoy your HSBC Premier Credit Card without any annual membership fees
CardItems.CircleTitleTwoDescription: Discounted hotels and access to airport lounges

Benefits.Title: Fees And Charges
Benefits.Content: Free primary card annual fee, with all supplementary cards free of charge. Minimum payment is 5% of outstanding balance or AED100 (whichever is higher)

Benefits.Title: No Annual fees
Benefits.Content: Enjoy your HSBC Premier Credit Card without any annual membership fees

Benefits.Title: Exclusive Premier Travel Privileges
Benefits.Content: Discounted hotels and access to airport lounges

Benefits.Title: Free Valet Parking
Benefits.Content: At selected Valtrans locations around Dubai and Abu Dhabi

Benefits.Title: Air Miles Rewards Program
Benefits.Content: Air Miles rewards that can be redeemed for flights with any airline, at any time to any destination

Benefits.Title: Entertainer & I Love Dining
Benefits.Content: Free download of our 'Buy 1 Get 1 Free' mobile app with over 8,000 offers across 15 countries

CardItems.KeyFeatures:
• No Annual Fees
  • Exclusive Premier Travel Privileges
  • Valet Parking
  • Air Miles Rewards Program
  • Entertainer & I Love Dining

CardItems.Title: Black Credit Card
CardItems.Summary: The top-of-the-line HSBC Black MasterCard' Credit Card is designed to provide you with experiences that you'll cherish for the rest of your life. From travel to culinary experiences, culture and shopping there's no limit to where the benefits can take you.
CardItems.CircleTitleTwoDescription: Unlimited access at over 500 premium airport lounges worldwide provided by LoungeKeyTM

CardItems.Title: Platinum Cashback Card
CardItems.Summary: The ultimate utility card if you're looking for one. With the HSBC Platinum Cashback card, get guaranteed cashback of up to 10% on all your credit card spends. And that's just the beginning. Enjoy special offers and rewards on your day-to-day activities, like 'buy 1 get 1 free' ticket at VOX cinemas or special discounts at over 100 restaurants in the UAE.

AccountItems.Title: Premier Current Account
AccountItems.Summary: Get an account that travels with you. Available in multiple currencies, it comes with an international debit card, a dedicated Premier Relationship Manager to help you manage your money and take advantage of investment opportunities. You will also get 24/7 Internet banking with Global View so you can manage all your accounts with just one log on.
AccountItems.CircleTitleOneDescription: Enjoy your HSBC Premier Credit Card without any annual membership fees
AccountItems.CircleTitleTwoDescription: Free instant money transfers within 6 seconds between your HSBC accounts globally

KeyFeatures.Feature: Free HSBC Premier Credit Card
Free instant money transfers between your HSBC accounts globally

AccountItems.Title: Premier Savings Account
AccountItems.Summary: Get an account that travels with you. Available in multiple currencies, it comes with an international debit card, a dedicated Premier Relationship Manager to help you manage your money and take advantage of investment opportunities. You will also get 24/7 Internet banking with Global View so you can manage all your accounts with just one log on.  The Savings Account also enables secure and flexible way to save for the things that are important to you. Not only do you earn interest, but you also have immediate access to your money.
